title: The Dawn
content:
When the sun breaks the night,
Hope rises with its light...

title: My Cry
content:
They say the end of the world is nigh
And I want to go to heaven when I die
I lift my eyes to look up high,
Seeking comfort in the sky...

title: Silent Echo
content:
Through the valleys deep and wide,
Whispers of dreams still collide...
An echo drifts, soft and slow,
Carrying truths we may not know...
